The food at Rasheed's Seafood and Chicken Rice store is good in general. I like the Salted Egg Chicken Rice, Egg Gravy Hor Fun, and the Roasted Chicken Rice Set.

The cheese fries from the Western store is great as well!

Indian owner kopitiam here in Tuas Basin.  The Kopi O is Okay for me and the queue for beverages is rather long. This place is kept rather clean and provided with Round Marble Tables and good support chairs for patrons.

Tried the Economical Bee Hoo stall and I ordered the Kway Teow and Mee combi; the Kway Teow has the char Taste which is good on my opinion!

Many workers from the nearby offices popped in for breakfast. Many choices of Indian food here and the western grill and pasta which I would definitely like to try on my next trip here!
Best Nasi lemak ever tasted. Mutton was excellent, tender and delicious. Added prawns sambal and that too was very well prepared. Surely will eat more and recommend others not to miss this eatery.

Having lunch qst time here recommendated by friend working at Tuas South. A good pplace to have meal in Tuas Area, look new, have big ceiling fan feel relief after a few hour working. There are quite a few of F&B. Will try more food if come again.
